title: Beef and stout pie
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '450g cubed beef steak or stew meat', '2 rashers bacon, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 carrot, sliced', '150g crimini mushrooms, sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons plain flour', '225ml GuinnessÂ®, or other stout', '300ml beef stock', '1/2 teaspoon ground thyme', '2 bay leaves', '1/2 teaspoon cornflour, or as needed', '1 teaspoon water', '250g frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 egg, beaten']
